channel.title: Grep on KhanhIceTea B(rain)-log

item.title: What I learned in 2017-09-05
item.description: SYSADMIN Ansible playbook : skip to task You can skip to a task by its name by adding parameter --start-at $ ansible-playbook playbook.yml --start-at="[your task name]" SYSADMIN Grep : find a string in folder Grep is a greate tool for searching a string in files. Syntax $ grep -nr '[string]' [folder] If you want to show surrounding lines the result, add flag -C [number] to the command
